query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Taciti, soli, sanza compagnia 2 n’andavam l’un dinanzi e l’altro dopo, 3 come frati minor vanno per via.
query.error: **English:** 1 Silent, alone, without company, 2 we went, one in front and the other behind, 3 like friars minor going on their way.
query.result: 1 Mौनāḥ, ekākī, anāthāḥ, 2 Ekaḥ agre, aparaḥ paścāt, 3 Yathā kṣullakā bhikṣavaḥ pathi gacchanti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 Vòlt’ era in su la favola d’Isopo 5 lo mio pensier per la presente rissa, 6 dov’ el parlò de la rana e del topo;
query.error: **English:** 4 My thoughts were turned to Aesop’s fable 5 about the present conflict, 6 where he spoke of the frog and the mouse;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 ché più non si pareggia ‘mo’ e ‘issa’ 8 che l’un con l’altro fa, se ben s’accoppia 9 principio e fine con la mente fissa.
query.error: **English:** 7 for “now” and “then” are no more alike 8 than the one is to the other, if we compare 9 the beginning and the end with a steady mind.
query.result: 7 yataḥ adhunā “idānīm” iti “iti” iti ca 8 na samānaṃ bhavataḥ, yadi samyak militaḥ 9 ādiśca antaśca sthirabuddhyā.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 E come l’un pensier de l’altro scoppia, 11 così nacque di quello un altro poi, 12 che la prima paura mi fé doppia.
query.error: **English:** 10 And as one thought bursts from another, 11 so from that one another was born, 12 which doubled my first fear.
query.result: 10 Eva ca yathā ekaḥ smaraṇaḥ anyasmāt sphuṭati, 11 Tathā tasmāt anyaḥ tataḥ ajāyata, 12 Yaḥ prathamam bhayam me dviguṇam cakāra.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Io pensava così: ‘Questi per noi 14 sono scherniti con danno e con beffa 15 sì fatta, ch’assai credo che lor nòi.
query.error: **English:** 13 I thought thus: ‘These are scorned by us 14 with harm and mockery 15 so great that I believe they have none.’
query.result: 13 Ahaṃ cintāmi sma: ‘Ime asmābhiḥ 14 Ninditāḥ santīha hiṃsāparihāsābhyām 15 Tathāvidhaiḥ, yathā manye na teṣāṃ naḥ.’

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Se l’ira sovra ’l mal voler s’aggueffa, 17 ei ne verranno dietro più crudeli 18 che ’l cane a quella lievre ch’elli acceffa’.
query.error: **English:** 16 If anger seizes upon the evil will, 17 they will come after us more cruelly 18 than the dog after the hare that it seizes.
query.result: 16 Yadi kopas tadadhaḥ pāpam ākramet, 17 tau naḥ anvetiṣyataḥ krūratarau, 18 śvā iva sasaṃ yam ākramet.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 te e me tostamente, i’ ho pavento 23 d’i Malebranche. Noi li avem già dietro; 24 io li ’magino sì, che già li sento».

query.result: 22 ātmānam ca māṃ ca kṣipram, mama bhayam asti 23 Malebranchebhyaḥ. Vayam etān adhunā pṛṣṭhatas tasthitān vetti, 24 aham etān evaṃ kalpayāmi yathā etān adhunā śṛṇomi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 E quei: «S’i’ fossi di piombato vetro, 26 l’imagine di fuor tua non trarrei 27 più tosto a me, che quella dentro ’mpetro.
query.error: **English:** 25 And he: "If I were made of molten glass, 26 I would not draw your outward image 27 to myself more quickly than that within me.
query.result: 25 Sa ca: "Api yadi syām dīpyamānakakācamayaḥ, 26 Na tvām bāhyarūpiṇīm ākarṣeyam 27 Ātmani yathā 'ntarnihitām."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Pur mo venieno i tuo’ pensier tra ’ miei, 29 con simile atto e con simile faccia, 30 sì che d’intrambi un sol consiglio fei.
query.error: **English:** 28 Yet your thoughts come to me, 29 with such demeanor and such countenance, 30 that from both of us I made a single decision.
query.result: 28 Tathāpi tava cintā mama madhye āgacchati, 29 Tulyena ācāreṇa saha tulyena ca mukhena, 30 Yataḥ ubhayataḥ aham eka eva niścayaḥ cakāra.

query.prompt:
